meanings.sent1: The emblemizing flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The emblemizing logo on the uniform stood out.
meanings.sent3: The emblemizing shield seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: Her emblemizing smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The emblemizing painting told a silent story.

meanings.sent1: The emblemizing colors of the flowers brightened the garden.
meanings.sent3: The emblemizing star seemed to dance in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His emblemizing words echoed in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The emblemizing melody touched their hearts.

meanings.definition: To serve as an emblem of
meanings.sent1: She was emblemizing courage in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent2: The statue emblemizing peace stood tall in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cake emblemizing a mountain was a sweet surprise.
meanings.sent4: His actions emblemizing loyalty inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The monument emblemizing unity brought people together.
